name: incubator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a container that has controlled air and temperature conditions in which a weak or premature baby (= one which was born too early) can be kept alive
Nerthuz/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a device for keeping birds' eggs at the correct temperature to allow young birds to develop until they break out of the shell
© Santiago Urquijo/Moment/GettyImages

an organization that helps people to start new companies, especially ones involved with advanced technology: The university has a business incubator to foster technology start-ups. an incubator unit
